response.overview: On Aug. 21, 2015, the world watches in stunned silence as the media reports a thwarted terrorist attack on a train that's bound for Paris -- an attempt prevented by three young Americans traveling together through Europe. The heroic and courageous actions of Anthony Sadler, Alek Skarlatos and Spencer Stone help to save the lives of more than 500 passengers on board.
response.tagline: In the face of fear ordinary people can do the extraordinary
response.title: The 15:17 to Paris

results.name: Go Behind the Scenes with Clint Eastwood
